title: 5 new limited edition 'type art' prints from www.seblester.co.uk
content:
Announcing the release of a set of 5 limited edition 'type art' screenprints.  
I've used some of the best printers, paper and inks available.  
Please visit [www.seblester.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071147/http:/www.seblester.co.uk/ "www.seblester.co.uk") for full details.  
In summary:

'Mightier' - A2 signed limited edition of 75 only.  
Metallic gold ink on black Plike, 160gsm.

'Believe' - A2 signed limited edition of 50 only.  
Red, black and a subtle bronze gold on Bright White Colorplan, 270gsm.

'Mmm' - A2 signed limited edition of 50 only.  
Red and black ink of Fabriano 5 Smooth, 300gsm.

'Indelicate' - A2 signed limited edition of 50 only.  
Gunmetal metallic silver ink on black Plike, 160 gsm.

'Simple' - A2 signed limited edition of 200.  
Black ink on Azure Blue Colorplan Smooth, 270 gsm.

I've also updated my website with new illustration,  
lettering and 'found type' photos.

Thanks for reading,

Seb Lester

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015071147im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SexyType_PR_4908.jpg)
author: Seb Lester
